user_query: I'm planning a sports-themed event for my company and would like to include some football highlights in the presentation. Can you help me find the most memorable and iconic moments in football history? Also, suggest some anime series with sports themes that I can incorporate into the event.

TaskList.description: Research and gather a list of memorable and iconic moments in football history.
Compile a list of popular sports-themed anime series.
Create a presentation slide that includes the collected football highlights and anime series.
